messages.subject: My photo album ...
messages.msgSnippet: Help I have recently created a photo album in anticipation of posting some photographs and find that, unlike the other albums, mine has a tick box.  Could
messages.messageBody:
Help

I have recently created a photo album in anticipation of posting
some photographs and find that, unlike the other albums, mine has a
tick box. Could somebody please explain to me the significance of
this box please?

I fear that perhaps I am being a bit thick over this.

Regards, John L.
